text: Michael Anthony Fleet (born 1938), is an athletics coach and former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the 880 yards at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. He was a member of the Croydon Harriers Club and remains there as a coach. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:English male middle- distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Mike Fleet
